root:
^avô Pedro: Lua! How many times did I tell you not to go into my garage?

~ Press Space

c-0: ^avô Pedro: Let me guess... you followed that imaginary cat into the garage again, didn’t you?
c-1: ^avô Pedro: What am I going to do with you?

c-0: ^avô Pedro: Well, I suppose even imaginary cats need saving. You’ve got your priorities straight, at least.
c-1: ^avô Pedro: I’ll take that as a yes. Or a no. Who knows with you?

ok: ^avô Pedro: Actually, that's alright. I was going to bring you along today anyway.
^avô Pedro: You know that I run a shop right?
^avô Pedro: Well my assistant Luke got hurt yesterday while tending to it.
^avô Pedro: I thought you could help me by replacing him for the time being.

c-0: ^avô Pedro: Nothing to be worried about, I promise, neta!

parents: ^avô Pedro: Before I continue, you have to promise never to tell anything about it to your parents!

c-0: ^avô Pedro: Sometimes, lying is ok...especially when it’s to protect something you care about.
c-1: ^avô Pedro: Ahah! Your mum would be furious to hear you say that!

magic: ^avô Pedro: The kind of stuff I deal with can’t be out in the open.
^avô Pedro: You see, I deal with clients that bring me magical items.
^avô Pedro: Seeing as how magic is now illegal, you understand why your parents would be concerned.

c-0: ^avô Pedro: Magic yes... don't look at me like this, I'm not crazy!
c-1: ^avô Pedro: You did? Well, I guess Luke wasn’t as careful as he should’ve been...

explain_shop: ^avô Pedro: Anyways, if the authorities find out, we could get into serious trouble.
^avô Pedro: Now, let me explain to you how the shop works.
^avô Pedro: Clients will come with an artefact that they wish to sell you.
^avô Pedro: Your job is to figure out what it's worth and haggle for a good deal.
^avô Pedro: Each client has a minimum price they’re willing to accept, so don’t offer too low or they’ll walk away.
^avô Pedro: The less you pay for their items, the more profit we make!
^avô Pedro: I will be selling the newly acquired items tonight so please don't buy too much junk !
^avô Pedro: I'll help you with the first client. Look, they're coming in already, are you ready?

c-0: ^avô Pedro: That's the spirit! Let's get started.
c-1: ^avô Pedro: That's okay. Everyone starts somewhere. Just watch and learn.
